exception.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: interface java.sql.Connection.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 23 JVM vendor name : Oracle Corporation JVM vendor version : 23+37-2369 JVM name : Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 23+37-2369 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Mac OS X OS version : 15.2
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
Underlying exception : org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Could not modify all classes [interface java.sql.Connection, interface java.sql.Wrapper, interface java.lang.AutoCloseable]
